name: The Darkest Road
description:
SUMMARY:


This is an old-school 2D RPG in the vein of Skyfall, Last Heroes and Fantasy Heroes.

Two centuries have passed since The Destroyer has confined all humankind to Grottom, a underground world deprived of the sunlight originally inhabited by Orcs. Down there, human and orcs have waged a continuous war for the control of Grottom. All the while, a prophecy states that two Trial Ones, armed with the Shield and Sword of Destiny stand a chance against Destroyer, defeating him, the humankind can finally go home.

You play as Callum and Lucia, the Trial Ones, as they find their way to be together in this epic battle that will change their and everyone else's lives.

FEATURES:


  • Alternate between two characters until their paths cross.
  • Rich unique world to explore.
  • Sidequests to complete.
  • Quest Journal to keep track of your objectives.
  • Mouse Support.
